availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James S. McHatton (Gallatin County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Frances Huston McHatton. Father of Frances Ellen McHatton, Florence McHatton, and Robert McHatton. Clerk in Gallatin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Gallatin County in 1860. Clerk in Gallatin County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 153A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, Warsaw, p. 527.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Gallatin County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 116.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994035, Gallatin County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994035, Gallatin County Births.
